General.Name: Atal SA
General.Description: Atal S.A. engages in the development and sale of residential buildings in Poland. The company develops housing estates, and single and multi-family houses. It operates in Warsaw, Krakow, Silesia, Wroclaw, Poznan, Lódz, and the Tri-City. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Cieszyn, Poland. Atal S.A. is a subsidiary of Juroszek Holding Sp. z o.o.
